home::about-me::heading: About me
home::about-me::description: I am passionate about creating and maintaining responsive web applications, specializing in frontend technologies like JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, and CSS. I use modern frameworks such as Angular with RxJS to ensure our projects run smoothly across all browsers and deliver top-notch performance. Implementing coding standards and configuring tools like SonarQube has significantly improved our code quality and readability, reducing the Pull Requests review times by about 60%.
home::resume::heading: Experience & Education
home::resume::parkbee::title: Tech Lead / Senior Frontend Developer
home::resume::parkbee::subtitle: July 2023 - Present | Amsterdam, Netherlands
home::resume::parkbee::description: Tech Lead & Senior Developer. Architected a cost-saving notification system and a serverless GraphQL gateway. Implemented Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines and ensured high availability with AWS CloudWatch. Mentored the team and improved documentation.
home::resume::25friday::title: Senior Frontend Developer
home::resume::25friday::subtitle: Sept 2022 - June 2023 | Porto, Portugal
home::resume::25friday::description: Optimized Angular components, boosting performance by 42%. Improved SEO to >90% and enhanced WebCore Vitals. Configured SonarQube to reduce PR review times by 60%.
home::resume::natixis::title: Senior Frontend Developer
home::resume::natixis::subtitle: April 2021 - Sept 2022 | Porto, Portugal
home::resume::natixis::description: Developed robust web systems using Angular. Conducted Unit and E2E testing. Designed user-friendly interfaces and migrated key applications from AngularJS to Angular.
home::resume::pravaler::title: Software Development Engineer
home::resume::pravaler::subtitle: Oct 2018 - April 2021 | SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil
home::resume::pravaler::description: Built dynamic interfaces with Angular. Integrated a new product from simulation to back-office in two days. Developed a financial simulator tool from concept to production.

about::hero::heading: I'm Maria Junqueira, a Product and Web Designer
about::hero::introduction: With over 6 years of experience in frontend development, I specialize in creating responsive, user-centric web applications. I'm passionate about clean code, exceptional user experiences, and leading teams to build scalable solutions.
about::story::heading: My story
about::story::description: I discovered my passion for web development early in my career, and it has been an incredible journey ever since. Starting from building simple websites to architecting complex cloud-based solutions, I've continuously evolved my skills. At ParkBee, I lead frontend initiatives, mentor developers, and implement best practices that have significantly improved our development workflow. My approach combines technical excellence with a deep understanding of user needs, ensuring every project delivers both performance and delight.
about::timeline::heading: Designing since I was 16 years old
about::timeline::description: My journey in creating digital experiences began at a young age. Here are some highlights:
about::timeline::item1: Started with HTML and CSS, building websites for local businesses and learning the fundamentals of web design.
about::timeline::item2: Developed expertise in modern frameworks like Angular and Vue, while maintaining a focus on performance and accessibility.
about::timeline::item3: Led teams to implement CI/CD pipelines, improve code quality by 60%, and deliver exceptional user experiences across multiple projects.
